post:
I am glad to announce that there is one new community comes.In this we provide virtual private server for posting 10 useful thread and 5000 points.

** Presently we are providing:-**

**Disk space:** 20GB (Raid10 Hardware)	
**Bandwidth:** 250GB	
**Dedicated RAM:** 256Mb	
**VSwap RAM:** 256Mb	
**IPv4:** 1 IPv4	
**IPv6:** 64 (with Dallas, Texas)	
**Network Speed:** 1 Gbit	
**Control Panel:** SolusVM	
**Virtualization:** OpenVZ 
**Location: **Buffalo, New York and Dallas, Texas	


**Info and Requirements:** https://vps4post.com/requirements.php
